General.Name: Fortitude Gold Corp
General.Description: Fortitude Gold Corporation, a mining company, focuses on exploring gold and silver projects. Its principal property is the Isabella Pearl mine project covering an area of 9,777 acres located in the Mineral County, Nevada. The company was founded in 2020 and is headquartered in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
General.Address: 2886 Carriage Manor Point, Colorado Springs, CO, United States, 80906
